Title: Holographic microscopy with acoustic modulation for detection of nano-sized particles and pathogens in solution
Abstract: © 2019 The Author(s)We present a method for the detection of nanoparticles in solution using an acoustically actuated holographic microscope. This type of microscopy can be used for high-throughput biosensing applications, e.g., detection of viruses in a liquid.
